name: rex
description: rex is a Really EXcellent way to build webapps

scripts.docker:db:sync: docker-compose run api npm run db:sync
scripts.docker:db:sync:force: docker-compose run api npm run db:sync:force
scripts.docker:db:seed:all: docker-compose run api npm run db:seed:all
scripts.docker:db:seed:undo: docker-compose run api npm run db:seed:undo
scripts.docker:db:seed:undo:all: docker-compose run api npm run db:seed:undo:all
scripts.docker:db:reset: docker-compose run api npm run db:reset
scripts.docker:repl: docker-compose run api npm run repl
scripts.docker:db:repl: docker-compose run db psql -p 5432 -h db -U postgres
scripts.test: npm run ui:test && npm run docker:api:test
scripts.docker:api:test: docker-compose run api npm run api:test
scripts.docker:api:watch:test: docker-compose run api npm run api:watch:test
scripts.install: npm run install:schema && npm run install:ui && npm run install:api
